Package MainGameLogic

Class Store

java.lang.Object
MainGameLogic.Store
public class Store
extends java.lang.Object
This class represents the Stores in game and holds the items each have along with the code needed to buy and sell items to the Store.
Version:
1.1, 22 April 2021.
Author:
John Elliott

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Store​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> buying, java.util.ArrayList<Item> selling, java.lang.String shopName)
    Initializes the Store object which is used when the player wishes to buy or sell items during their visit to the Store on the current MainGameLogic.Island.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.String buyingString()
    Returns a string with information about the items being bought at the Store.

    A method used buy a given MainGameLogic.Item from the Store.
    int findProfit​(java.util.ArrayList<Item> cargo)
    Find the maximum profit that could be made at the Store with a given list of items.
    java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getItemsToBuy()
    A get method used to get the list of items names that are being bought.
    java.util.ArrayList<Item> getItemsToSell()
    A get method used to get the list of items being sold.
    java.lang.String sellingString()
    Returns a string with information about the items being sold at the Store.
    int sellItem​(int itemIndex, Ship ship, Island currentIsland)
    Get an item from the ships cargo and finds its base price.
    int sellItems​(java.util.ArrayList<Item> items)
    Sells all items in a list to the store.

  • Constructor Details

    • Store

      public Store​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> buying, java.util.ArrayList<Item> selling, java.lang.String shopName)
      Initializes the Store object which is used when the player wishes to buy or sell items during their visit to the Store on the current MainGameLogic.Island.
      Parameters:
      buying - A list of Strings they Store will buy.
      selling - A list of Items the Store will sell.
      shopName - The name of the store.

  • Method Details

    • buyItem

      public int buyItem​(int index, Ship ship)
      A method used buy a given MainGameLogic.Item from the Store. Adds the item to the ship and removes it from the Store. Returns the price of the Item so its price can be removed from the players wealth.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the MainGameLogic.Item within the Store, MainGameLogic.Item list.
      ship - The current Ship the player is using, to determine if the MainGameLogic.Item can fit.
      Returns:
      itemPrice The price it cost to buy the item.

    • buyingString

      public java.lang.String buyingString()
      Returns a string with information about the items being bought at the Store.
      Returns:
      buying Information about the items being bought.

    • sellingString

      public java.lang.String sellingString()
      Returns a string with information about the items being sold at the Store.
      Returns:
      selling Information about the items being sold.

    • getItemsToSell

      public java.util.ArrayList<Item> getItemsToSell()
      A get method used to get the list of items being sold.
      Returns:
      itemsToSell A list of items being sold.

    • sellItem

      public int sellItem​(int itemIndex, Ship ship, Island currentIsland)
      Get an item from the ships cargo and finds its base price. Then determines if the price is increases or decreased. Finally removes the item from the Ship and adds its price to the players wealth.
      Parameters:
      itemIndex - The index of the MainGameLogic.Item within the ships cargo.
      ship - The current Ship the player is using so the item can be removed.
      currentIsland - The Island the player is on so the Store can be checked if the items price is increased.
      Returns:
      price The price it was sold at so it can be added to the players wealth.

    • getItemsToBuy

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getItemsToBuy()
      A get method used to get the list of items names that are being bought.
      Returns:
      buying A list of items being bought.

    • findProfit

      public int findProfit​(java.util.ArrayList<Item> cargo)
      Find the maximum profit that could be made at the Store with a given list of items.
      Parameters:
      cargo - A list of items.
      Returns:
      profit The profit that can be made.

    • sellItems

      public int sellItems​(java.util.ArrayList<Item> items)
      Sells all items in a list to the store.
      Parameters:
      items - A list of items to sell.
      Returns:
      totalPrice The total price gained.
